title: Swiss Monetary Base Aggregate
notes:
Monthly data is taken as the average of daily data.

Aggregate of Relevant Foreign Currency Positions, Securities Portfolio, and Money Market Transactions of SNB minus the balance of the remaining balance sheet positions. In order to fully understand the values in this series, it is necessary to consult the corresponding publication document provided at https://data.snb.ch/en/topics/texts#!/doc/explanations_snb
